author: buscob
msg: Changed several ecommerce ftl files rendering screenlets so that the HTML is the same as the one that is rendered by the screenlet widget.
Added screenlet styles to the ecommain.css
This allows better and more omogeneus rendering when mixing together FTL and screenlet widgets.
